article: Having written a book on rock music and a book on jazz music, and now writing a book _ the classical music of the 20 century, I felt the _ to put somewhere the music that does not quite fit _ of these kinds of music. I also felt that I needed to research the beginning of the popular music in Western Europe and the USA in order to _ understand the change of the jazz and rock music. I also felt that ethnic music has become so _ that one should research the development from Western European and USA music. This book aims at _ all these gaps . I did my best to give it a systematic feeling, although it is clear that musicians from such different parts of the world had very _ in common. Only after the joining together of the 1907s can we _ of a worldwide history of popular music. This book is about the _ of that formation . It was not very difficult to decide how to _ jazz music from pop music. It was much more _ to decide how to separate rock music _ the rest of popular music, because rock music has taken in just about everything. Pieces of this book were firstly written for my 2003 books on rock music. _ that happened after the 1960s will be in the book on rock music. The _ is that you should read this book first, then the _ of jazz music and the history of rock music.
